text: Ara yara imana eneche ebam sat kaja kareche taderake subha sambada dina ye, tadera jan'ya rayeche jannata, yara taladese nadi prabahita [1]. Yakhana'i taderake phalamula khete deya habe takhana'i tara balabe, â€˜amaderake purbe jibika hisebe ya deya hata eto ta'iâ€™. Ara taderake ta deya habe sadrsyapurna kare'i [2] ebam sekhane tadera jan'ya rayeche pabitra saiini [3]. Ara tara sekhane sthayi habe
